interfaces.sourceCode:
export interface IOrderDetailItem{
  product_id: any,
  product_price: number,
  discount_price: number,
  amount_subtotal: number,
  amount_total: number,
  delivery: number,
  quantity: number,
  range_day: string,
  supplier_delivery: any,
  method_id: any,
  product_name: string,
  friendly_url: string,
  brand: any
}

export interface IOrderItem{
  detail: Array<IOrderDetailItem>,
  amount_total: number,
  amount_subtotal: number,
  amount_discount: number,
  amount_delivery: number,
  code: string,
  type_payment: string,
  delivery_address: string,
  delivery_reference: string,
  create_date: Date,
  state: string
}

interfaces.name: IOrderItem
interfaces.sourceCode:
export interface IOrderDetailItem{
  product_id: any,
  product_price: number,
  discount_price: number,
  amount_subtotal: number,
  amount_total: number,
  delivery: number,
  quantity: number,
  range_day: string,
  supplier_delivery: any,
  method_id: any,
  product_name: string,
  friendly_url: string,
  brand: any
}

export interface IOrderItem{
  detail: Array<IOrderDetailItem>,
  amount_total: number,
  amount_subtotal: number,
  amount_discount: number,
  amount_delivery: number,
  code: string,
  type_payment: string,
  delivery_address: string,
  delivery_reference: string,
  create_date: Date,
  state: string
}
